transcription: Hey friends, it's 930 on Friday and it's a crazy busy day today so I'm going to try to take you along with me as much as I can. So this is sticker paper and so when I print them out I'm going to hand each child an ornament and they can stick their own picture on here. So I bought enough sharpie markers for each of the tables so they can  all write their names and the year on the back. Here's all the ornaments in here. I got these at Hobby Lobby.
